title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Review and Update
description: Thoroughly update the project requirements documentation with detailed descriptions of the multicast applications to be built (including specific functionalities, such as application architecture, supported protocols, error handling, etc.), the virtual private clouds and accounts to be integrated (with their respective regions, services, and any necessary access configurations), the external multicast services to be used (including API documentation or relevant links, along with details about service integration methods), expected performance and scalability requirements (including benchmarks if available), security and compliance considerations (including required certifications, data protection strategies, and incident response plans), any assumptions or constraints, and other relevant details. Address any gaps in the original requirements. Provide a clear timeline for completion of each deliverable, and identify key milestones. Also, document any potential risks, mitigation strategies, and contingency plans. Upon completion, conduct a peer review to ensure alignment with project goals and industry best practices. If necessary, collaborate with other team members or external stakeholders to gather missing information. Once approved, update the rfc_state field accordingly. The assigned_to field remains 'code-architect' for this task.

title: Design System Architecture for MulticastMesh
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, their interactions, and the integration points with external services. The design should address the following aspects: 1) Scalability and load balancing to handle increasing multicast traffic, 2) Fault tolerance and high availability, 3) Security considerations for data transmission and access control (with emphasis on encryption and authentication), 4) Monitoring and logging mechanisms (including real-time monitoring and alert systems), 5) Integration with external multicast services and VPCs/accounts, 6) Document the architecture design in a clear and concise manner for effective communication with other team members. Additionally, consider the need for modularity to facilitate future updates and extensions. The final document should be structured according to architectural patterns and best practices.

title: Implement Core Functionality
description: Develop the core functionality of the multicast applications, including the multicast mesh logic and the integration with external multicast services.

title: Implement Virtual Private Cloud Integration
description: Develop the functionality to integrate the multicast applications with multiple virtual private clouds and accounts.

title: Set up Testing and Deployment Infrastructure
description: Set up the necessary infrastructure for testing and deploying the multicast applications, including continuous integration and deployment pipelines.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to ensure the multicast applications and data are secure, including authentication, authorization, and encryption.

title: Create Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the multicast applications, including user guides, developer guides, and deployment guides.

title: Perform Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans to ensure the multicast applications meet the project requirements and are of high quality.
